<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Policy Fragment: protected resource - introspect credentials"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue=""/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="client_id"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="Use secure password reference to provision the client secret"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:AssertionComment>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue=""/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="client_secret"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${client_id}"/>
                    <L7p:ExpressionIsVariable booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Operator operatorNull="null"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item dataType="included">
                            <L7p:Type variableDataType="string"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:Negated booleanValue="true"/>
                            <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${client_secret}"/>
                    <L7p:ExpressionIsVariable booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Operator operatorNull="null"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item dataType="included">
                            <L7p:Type variableDataType="string"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:Negated booleanValue="true"/>
                            <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtjbGllbnRfaWR9OiR7Y2xpZW50X3NlY3JldH0="/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="introspectCredentials"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:EncodeDecode>
                    <L7p:SourceVariableName stringValue="introspectCredentials"/>
                    <L7p:TargetDataType variableDataType="string"/>
                    <L7p:TargetVariableName stringValue="introspectCredentials"/>
                    <L7p:TransformType transformType="BASE64_ENCODE"/>
                </L7p:EncodeDecode>
                <L7p:AddHeader>
                    <L7p:HeaderName stringValue="Authorization"/>
                    <L7p:HeaderValue stringValue="${introspectCredentials}"/>
                    <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="introspectRequest"/>
                    <L7p:RemoveExisting booleanValue="true"/>
                    <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                </L7p:AddHeader>
                <L7p:assertionComment>
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="Using client credentials"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:assertionComment>
            </wsp:All>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${client_id}"/>
                    <L7p:ExpressionIsVariable booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Operator operatorNull="null"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item dataType="included">
                            <L7p:Type variableDataType="string"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${client_secret}"/>
                    <L7p:ExpressionIsVariable booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Operator operatorNull="null"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item dataType="included">
                            <L7p:Type variableDataType="string"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${request.http.header.x-introspect-authorization}"/>
                    <L7p:ExpressionIsVariable booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Operator operatorNull="null"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item dataType="included">
                            <L7p:Type variableDataType="string"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:Negated booleanValue="true"/>
                            <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:AddHeader>
                    <L7p:HeaderName stringValue="Authorization"/>
                    <L7p:HeaderValue stringValue="${request.http.header.x-introspect-authorization}"/>
                    <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="introspectRequest"/>
                    <L7p:RemoveExisting booleanValue="true"/>

                <L7p:assertionComment>
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>

                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:assertionComment>
            </wsp:All>
            <L7p:TrueAssertion/>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="Attach credentials to the introspect request"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>
